00036 typedef struct sgpBmHeadertag
00037 {
00038       UINT32      uiNumBytes;             //    number of bytes of the bitmap, including the
00039                                                             // memory for all variables in this structure plus
00040                                                             // all the memory in bitmap
00041       UINT32      uiWidth;                      // width of bitmap in pixels
00042       UINT32      uiHeight;               // height of bitmap in pixels
00043       UINT8       uiBitDepth;             // 8, 16, 24, or 32
00044       UINT8       uiNumPalEntries;  // if uiBitDepth is 8, non-zero, else 0
00045 } SGPBmHeader;
00046 
00047 typedef struct sgpBitmaptag
00048 {
00049       SGPBmHeader header;
00050       UINT8             uiData[1];  // if uiNumPalEntries != 0
00051                                                       //          uiNumPalEntries*3 (rgb) bytes for palette
00052                                                       // if uiBitDepth == 8
00053                                                       //          uiWidth * uiHeight bytes
00054                                                       // else if uiBitDepth == 16
00055                                                       //          uiWidth * uiHeight * 2 bytes
00056                                                       // else if uiBitDepth == 24
00057                                                       //          uiWidth * uiHeight * 3 bytes
00058                                                       // else if uiBitDepth == 32
00059                                                       //          uiWidth * uiHeight * 4 bytes
00060 } SGPBitmap;
00061 
00062 #endif
